dungeon.utils
Interface Persistent

All Known Implementing Classes:
Attack, AttackList, Creature, CreatureList, Dagger, Door, Faction, FactionList, Finish, FlameTrap, Floor, Game, Gold, Hero, Item, Key, Longbow, Map, Mob, Ogre, Orc, Pit, Potion, Smash, Sword, Tile, TileList, Treasure, TreasureList
public interface Persistent

Interface to allow for XML persistence
Implemented by classes which are to be serialised to XML

Method Summary
 void load(Node node)
          Set the object's fields from the given XML node
 void save(Node node)
          Save the object's state to the given XML node
